original_text: And there was a famine in the land: and Abram went down into Egypt to sojourn there; for the famine was grievous in the land.
korean_text: 그 땅에 기근이 들었으므로 아브람이 애굽에 거류하려고 그리로 내려갔으니 이는 그 땅에 기근이 심하였음이라

sentences.original_text: And there was a famine in the land
and Abram went down into Egypt
for the famine was grievous in the land
